Desc.entry: Applicants who are registered blind or partially sighted with Sheffield City Council's Neighbourhoods and Community Care Directorate or Children and Young People's Service qualify for a free bus pass. Hearing impaired people, people with a learning disability or people with "a permanent or substantial disability or illness which severely restricts their mobility" may apply for a pass entitling them to pay a reduced fare. If successful, the applicant is given a permit which they then exchange for a bus pass from one of the Travel Information Centres (see separate entries).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-5.30pm, for collecting or handing in forms
